BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 040255 HAM, an Urban Development Action Area Designation, Project, and the disposition of such property located at 200 Chambers Street, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 1.  This matter is subject to Council Review and action pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter and Article 16 of the General Municipal Law.

Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 040257 ZSM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3 to facilitate the development of a mixed use building.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
